Newbie Helper:
Did you forget the task? Blue Gemstone will be back soon. To get it, you must destroy the Gremlin's.
To attack monsters hover over Gremlin and left click. The cursor will turn into a sword. In this state, you must re-press the left mouse button, and you will begin to attack.
Try using "Soul Cry" before the attack. You will see that level of attack will increase. Use this skill, you can use the key F2, and when it is pressed again "Soul Cry" is disabled.

If you successfully complete the task, I will give you a useful item. Good luck!
